Flow.description: BODEV-4152 Renewal SAM BODEV-4149 Error when updating the CSM owner on the account BODEV-3916 Calculating Customer Growth Score and Growth Tier

formulas.name: AccountSubsidiary
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Subsidiary_lookup__c} = {!$Label.Bynder_BV_Subsidiary}, "Bynder B.V.", IF({!$Record.Subsidiary_lookup__c} = {!$Label.Bynder_LLC_Subsidiary}, "Bynder LLC", IF({!$Record.Subsidiary_lookup__c} = {!$Label.Bynder_Ltd_Subsidiary}, "Bynder Ltd", IF({!$Record.Subsidiary_lookup__c} = {!$Label.Bynder_Pty_Ltd_Subsidiary}, "Bynder Pty Ltd",NULL))))

formulas.description: Calculates the ARR Score used as input for Growth Score and Tier
formulas.name: ARR_Score
formulas.expression: IF( AND({!$Record.Current_ARR__c} >= 0,{!$Record.Current_ARR__c} <30000),1 , IF( AND({!$Record.Current_ARR__c} >= 30000 , {!$Record.Current_ARR__c} <50000),2 , IF( AND({!$Record.Current_ARR__c} >= 50000, {!$Record.Current_ARR__c} <80000),3 , IF( AND({!$Record.Current_ARR__c} >= 80000, {!$Record.Current_ARR__c} <120000),4 , IF( AND({!$Record.Current_ARR__c} >= 120000, {!$Record.Current_ARR__c} <150000),5 , IF({!$Record.Current_ARR__c} >=150000,6 , 0))))))

formulas.description: Score used as input to calculate Growth Score and Tier
formulas.name: Company_Size_Score
Growth_Tier

formulas.description: Industry score used as input for Growth Score and Tier
formulas.name: Industry_Group_Score

textTemplates.name: AccountOwnerChangeNotificationMessage
textTemplates.text: #[New Account Owner] @[{!$Record.OwnerId}] You have been selected as Owner for this account.

textTemplates.name: NotifyFinanceOnDuplicateNSID
textTemplates.text:
Hello,

An account is created or updated with the duplicate Netsuite Internal ID ({!$Record.Netsuite_Internal_ID__c}).


New Account : {!$Record.Name} ({!$Label.Org_base_URL_Lightning}/{!$Record.Id})

Existing Account : {!Get_duplicate_accounts.Name} ({!$Label.Org_base_URL_Lightning}/{!Get_duplicate_accounts.Id})


Thank You.

textTemplates.name: varBynderWizardEnabledChatterPost
textTemplates.text: #[Bynder_Wizard_Enabled] @[{!$Record.CSM_Owner__c}] Bynder Wizard has been enabled for this account.

textTemplates.name: varChatterTemplateNewCSMOwner
textTemplates.text: #[New CSM Owner] @[{!$Record.CSM_Owner__c}] You have been selected as CSM Owner for this account.

variables.description: Determines whether record is changed or not.
variables.name: recordChanged
